release.notes: D1 Minor changes to UpdateChecker Notifications. D2 Added config option to send a console command on Dragon death. Switched to i18n language files. D3 UpdateChecker reworked, added 20 Languages, added config for longname in console logs.

developer.notes: D1 Removed extra period in key for toggledebug command, that caused an NPE. Fixed chance configs. D2 Added missing language keys/values for /dde toggledebug, command.
